Posts.EditableText:
Hey! I'm new to text adventures, having just actually beginning to get really into it two days ago and starting 'Lynx Tale'. 

I'm very excited to get to join and be in this community and make some fun games! If you all could play and rate Lynx Tale while you're at it, I'd love it. I'm looking for some criticism and critiques so I can be the best I can be!

Cheers~
